#summary How to install MinGW

Download a !MinGW the MinGW-5.1.4.exe installer from https://sourceforge.net/project/showfiles.php?group_id=2435&package_id=240780, and execute it.

During the execution select just the g++ compiler to install. Then, accept the suggestion of installing the program in the C:MinGW directory.

Once !MinGW is properly installed, the next step is to install the MSYS shell environment. To do this follow the instraction in the correspondigne wiki page "InstallingMSYSForWindows".
